actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 321 - 86 (Record Vote No: 29).
Received in the Senate and read twice and held at the desk. Until close of business Thursday, February 27, 1986.
Referred to the Committee on Appropriations.
Committee on Appropriations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Appropriations. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatfield with an amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 532.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Senate insists on its amendments, asks for a conference, appoints conferees Cochran; McClure; Andrews; Abdnor; Kasten; Mattingly; Specter; Hatfield; Burdick; Stennis; Chiles; Sasser; Bumpers; Harkin.
House Disagreed to Senate Amendments by Unanimous Consent.
House Agreed to Request for Conference and Speaker Appointed Conferees: Whitten, Traxler, McHugh, Natcher, Akaka, Watkins, Durbin, Smith (IA), Smith (NE), Myers (IN), Rogers, Skeen, Conte.
Conference held.
Committee on Rules Granted a Rule Waiving Certain Points of Order.
Committee on Rules Granted a Rule Waiving Certain Points of Order.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.398 Reported to House.
Conferees agreed to file conference report in disagreement.
Conference Report 99-493 Filed in House.
House Concurred, in Senate Amendments , with Amendments by Yea-Nay Vote: 272 - 141 (Record Vote No: 50).
Motion to waive section 311 of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 rejected in Senate. By Yea-Nay Vote. 1-92. Record Vote No: 37.
Senate agreed to conference report by Voice Vote.
The House amendment to the Senate amendment ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to table the appeal from the ruling of the chair agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61-33. Record Vote No: 38.
Speaker Appointed Additional Conferee: Conte.
Speaker Appointed Conferees: Whitten, Traxler, McHugh, Natcher, Akaka, Watkins, Durbin, Smith (IA), Smith (NE), Myers (IN), Rogers, Skeen.
House Disagreed to Senate Amendments to House Amendments by Unanimous Consent.
House Insisted on its Amendments and Requested Further Conference.
Considered by Senate.
Senate concurred in House amendment to Senate amendment with an amendment (sp1698) by Voice Vote.
Senate insists on its amendments to the House amendment to the Senate amendment by Voice Vote.
Senate agreed to request for conference. Appointed conferees. Cochran; McClure; Andrews; Abdnor; Kasten; Mattingly; Specter; Hatfield; Burdick; Stennis; Chiles; Sasser; Bumpers; Harkin.
Conference Report 99-499 Filed in House.
Further conference report considered in Senate.
Senate agreed to further conference report by Voice Vote.
House Agreed to Conference Report by Yea-Nay Vote: 352 - 71 (Record Vote No: 65).
Measure Signed in Senate.
Cleared for White House.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 99-263.

official_title: A joint resolution making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the Department of Agriculture for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.

summary.as: Conference report filed in House, 2nd conference report
summary.text: (Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 99-499) Makes a supplemental appropriation for FY 1986 to the Department of Agriculture for Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) operations. Provides that after FY 1987 funds available to the CCC for the conservation reserve program and the Federal crop insurance program shall be available only as provided in advance by appropriation Acts. States that: (1) the sign-up agreement for the conservation reserve program should not reduce total production below domestic or export needs; and (2) such program shall not replace or reduce any existing conservation program. States that: (1) a specified sum shall be available for the Farmers Home Administration (FmHA) operating loan program; (2) the Secretary of Agriculture shall proceed immediately to make loans to farmers and farm owners; and (3) if such funds are insufficient, other funds should be made available for American ranchers' and farmers' credit needs.

titles.title: A joint resolution making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the Department of Agriculture for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.
